summary: Build a fully functional website matching an existing site's theme and features from provided screenshots, including user authentication with per-user profiles/onboarding and an admin panel for full content and vacancy management.

existing_features.title: Recreate the public landing page and overall layout to match the provided screenshots (header with logo + site name/subtitle, contact info strip, three feature cards, and a centered login/get-started card), keeping the same visual theme (light background, soft card shadows, blue accents, rounded containers).
Add static asset handling for the uploaded logo and use it in the header/hero as shown in the screenshots.
Implement working authentication using Internet Identity for regular users (job seekers) including login and logout flows from the UI elements shown (Sign In with Internet Identity, Logout).

Create and persist a per-user profile record keyed by the authenticated Principal; on first login, require the user to complete an onboarding flow to enter their personal details before accessing the main dashboard.
Implement the authenticated user dashboard navigation and pages shown in the screenshots: Browse Jobs, My Applications, Messages, Updates, and Profile.

Implement job vacancy data model and user-facing Browse Jobs experience including search, listing, vacancy detail view, and the ability for a user to apply for a job and see their applications in My Applications.
Implement an Updates/Posts feature visible to users (Updates tab) where admins can publish posts/announcements and users can view a chronological list.
Implement an in-app Messages feature (Messages tab) supporting at minimum admin-to-user messaging (broadcast or per-user) and user-to-admin messages, with a simple inbox thread/list UI.
Implement an admin authentication/authorization path (“Admin Login”) and role-based access control so admin users have full control over the system while regular users cannot access admin features.
Build an admin panel that allows admins to create, edit, and delete vacancies; create, edit, and delete posts/updates; and add/delete/manage pictures used in posts/updates or site content.
Create a coherent visual theme matching the screenshots across all pages (typography, spacing, card style, buttons, neutral backgrounds with blue accents) and apply it consistently using Tailwind.

new_feature_requests.summary: Recreate the website UI/theme and implement all features shown in the provided screenshots (including using the attached logo)
Implement working login/authentication and create a profile for each user; prompt first-time users to enter full personal details after initial login
Build an admin panel with full control/permissions to add/delete/manage vacancies, posts, and pictures/content

projectName: Recreate Purwanchal Job Center portal from screenshots with Internet Identity login, user profiles/onboarding, and admin CMS
